name: DRIFT (itch) (mapurl)
description:
A short little 2.5d game about an astronaut stranded in space. Should take approximately 20 minutes to complete. 2 endings. Made in 2016 for a game design course.

CREDITS
Programming/Art: Sophia Zhu
Art/Writing: Katherine Cao

NOTE: This game may not work properly on touchscreen/mobile devices.
